metadata.title: Halibut Setline Survey Data  1997

creators.name: University of Washington (UW), International Pacific Halibut Commission (IPHC)

metadata.description: The Halibut Commission extended its standard setline survey to the Bering Sea and Aleutians in 1997.  The survey design is a regular pattern of fixed stations on or near the slope, from  about 100 - 600 m depth.  The data are cached  by species plus length, sex and age for a sample of the halibut.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: To provide fishery - independent information relative abundance, age composition, growth and maturity of halibut.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Annually

Access constraints: None

Use constraints: None
